Malice::
 
He was shocked when she covered her face and began to cry.  he could not think for a moment, he did not know what caused her to do this.
 
"Wolfblade!  What is wrong?!  What happened?  Have... have I hurt you? Wolfblade, are you okay?"

Dark Mouse <raccoon7679@...> wrote:
OOC: *looks around for a snake*

Wolfblade::

She smiled as she knealed down beside him.  She took the piece of
fruit and bit into it. It was sweet. She smiled at him while he spoke
those wonderful words to her that she had so longed to hear. But now,
those words burned her audio sensors more than a lazer blast.  She
started to cry.  She dropped the apple and covered her face plates
with her hands.


"HA!  Is that all you got?  You boasted such power, such skill!  Where is your power and skill now?  You disappoint me, ha ha ha haa!" 

__________________________________________________
